attributes.action: signpost to petitions that are similar to those being rejected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Where a petition is rejected because it is similar to another or overlaps, this site should signpost to the one that it is supposedly similar to.  This is because it must have been identified in order for that decision to be made and it would allow the new petition orginator to be able to support the original petition.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
